description: Enterprise techniques used by nbtstat, ATT&CK software S0102 v1.0
name: nbtstat (S0102)

techniques.comment: [nbtstat](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0102) can be used to discover local NetBIOS domain names.
[nbtstat](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0102) can be used to discover current NetBIOS sessions.
